title: LF summoners to play ( just moved in to oce from kor we're smurfs)
body:
me and my 3 friends moved in to oce from korea which we're smurfs ( gold and plats)
looking for someone who is srs about getting in to higher ranks.
but we are almost in to lvl 30.
so we're looking for summoners who is available almost every night.
Please leave your username , age, available time OR add me and message me.
Please we're srs and we don't accept **trollers .**
we will be checking your history and etc. so pls take this srs
thank you.

replies.body:
Smilebox
From euw (living in NZ for a while) - Platinium on different account there
25years old
I main jungle, can play few supp. I also train other position ;).
I play usually in the evening, until late.
I just get my level 30 on this server.
What else...I think the best to see if we can play is to try !
Have fun :)

Username: Sir Jazza
Age: 18
Time: 4pm - 11pm everyday unless otherwise specified.
Am gold 4 at the moment but climbing.
